attributes.action: seek out those who use amature radio elegaly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am woken by an idiot at 2am,who has a CB licence,yet uses a ham radio,both in his home and car.I reported him.We cannot do anything,he does not have a licence.I get TVI shouting down a microphone at 2am not funny.I call for more legislation to correct elegal users.
